Question.Title: Background
Question.Text:
Question 1 of 7
Which department's most outstanding trait is their creativity and flexibility in working with clients to meet their needs?

Answer.Feedback: Incorrect - Our sales and marketing department is made up of account servicing and marketing professionals with extensive experience in the local and overseas markets. The most outstanding trait is their creativity and flexibility in working with clients to meet their needs.

Question.Title: Travel and Expenses
Question.Text:
Question 3 of 7
If a trip is scheduled for overseas, how long in advance should a travel request be made?

Answer.Feedback: A travel request should be made at least 1 week in advance

Question.Title: Benefits
Question.Text:
Question 4 of 7
Parental leave, is this available to mothers only?

Answer.Feedback: Parental leave is available to both mothers and fathers.

Question.Title: Employee Development
Question.Text:
Question 5 of 7
Should you hide short-comings during appraisal interviews?

Answer.Feedback: Honesty is always the best policy in appraisal interviews.

Question.Title: Terms of Employment
Question.Text:
Question 2 of 7
If you want to leave during your probationary period of employment, how much notice do you need to give?

Answer.Feedback: If you want to leave during your probationary period of employment you must give 2 weeks notice.

Question.Title: Health & Safety
Question.Text:
Question 6 of 7
Is it better to isolate a hazard rather than offer protection from it?

Answer.Feedback: If the hazard cannot be eliminated, you should always look to isolate a hazard rather than offering protection from it.
